name: Chinese Noodle Salad
author: DGRIFF718
summary: I didn't like this the first few times I tried it but now I love it!  It's got a tangy taste and goes well with Chinese food or sandwiches.  Leftovers are softer but great as a snack the next day.
ingredients: 2 (3 ounce) packages ramen noodles with seasoning packet
1 (10 ounce) can mandarin orange segments, drained
directions: In a microwave-safe bowl,  mix together vinegar, sugar, and oil
Microwave on high until sugar dissolves, about 1 minute
Mix well, and set aside to cool
Crush ramen noodles in the packages
In a salad bowl, toss romaine lettuce with oranges, almonds, and salad dressing
